sentences: Ján, also credited as Janko Lehotský (born 16 April 1947) is a Slovak composer and former leader of the Modus band.
Lehotský began his performing career when he was four years old, when he performed in a marionette theater.
In 1974 he began managing the band Modus, in which performed also Marika Gombitová and Miroslav Žbirka.
